relation: Great for these types of students
Undecided. Random academic knowledge seekers. Someone looking to improve their skills in many different areas. Someone exploring many career possibilities and curiosities.
Great affordable online classes for me to jump into
Go to the Penn Valley park. Also known as a dog park.
It's a community college so there is no housing.

My online class is full of new information and the teacher and curriculum are easy to follow. Great organization on my teachers behalf including the extra information she posts for us to study on our own.
Great for a starting college with the need to save on tuition. Surrounding colleges accept many transfer students from all Metropolitan Community College schools
Good online courses. Centered in a great, busy, affordable city. Constantly seeking to improve and please its students.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Bang for the buck Cheaper than a 4 year school! Food and Dining Haven't ate there. Dorm Life No dorms here. Academic Rigor The classes that i have had, have not been that hard. But i'm sure there are some rigorous courses here. Tips for prospective students Balance your classes with some easy and some hard. Don't weigh yourself down too much. And do your homework in every area of college, not just the coursework! In three sentences Just started here so not must to say yet, but so far so good, i guess. Financial aid has been the biggest struggle.
